about_the_game:
Featuring every track used in game, and an assortment of bonus tracks that represent original concepts, alternative approaches, or cut musical content.

Bubbz Set (15:25)
Bounce Bot Set (15:55)
Choir Set (6:12)
Gappy - Original, Shift, Harsh (6:10)
Gappy - Reverse (2:03)
Negative Space - Minimum (1:12)
Negative Space - Octave (1:16)
Negative Space - Mix (1:16)
Negative Space - Orchestral (1:20)
Navigate - Original (1:37)
Navigate - Resonance (1:37)
Navigate - Discussion (1:37)
Navigate - Decision (1:37)
Thought - Pulse (Bonus Track) (2:07)
Thought - Conversation (Bonus Track) (2:14)
Thought - Rolling (Bonus Track) (2:18)
Navigate - Alternative (Bonus Track) (1:37)
Choir - Alternative Set (Bonus Track) (5:16)
Choir Finale (Bonus Track) (1:35)
Negative Space - Original Concept (Bonus Track) (0:47)
Negative Space - Hylian (Bonus Track) (1:16)
If This Game Had a Boss (Bonus Track) (1:21)
Travel - Lonely, Partner, Journey (Bonus Track) (6:10)
Original Trailer Music (Bonus Track) (1:11)

name: Adjacency OST
short_description: Official soundtrack (and bonus tracks) from the game Adjacency, created with love by Haley De Boom.
